website_summaries.verdict: The AZC-605-UR21 is a decent entry level all-in-one PC, though for the money there are alternatives that also merit consideration.
pros: USB 3.0 on front and back panels

customer_reviews.title: The new one has been great works amazingly fast and has all the features we ...
customer_reviews.text: First one we purchased wS a lemon it locked up on the 4th day of having it! Called Acer tech support who asked we send it in to them for repair. I refused, contacted Amazon they sent UPS to pick up defected computer and sent a new one in less than a week. The new one has been great works amazingly fast and has all the features we need in a home computer. Purchased wireless mouse and keyboard the picture is misleading they aren't wireless with the unit
customer_reviews.author: Chad liesman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't like it...felt cheap. I returned it and bought another Lenova all-in-one instead and lived happily ever after,
customer_reviews.author: Linda Keller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The person I ordered it for has not given any comment on it so I suppose everything is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Below Average
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have HDMI port. The keyboards was dysfunctional, random characters appeared when i pressed certain keys. It's WiFi capabilities are weak. Out of all the PCs in the house this is the only one that loose connect on a regular.
customer_reviews.author: Marlan

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the family and we all love it. Very fast and efficient. Camera included but we bought one separately bc it's not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Montero

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It's almost everything I wanted. The only real problem is windows. Windows 8 has been replaced by 8.1. If you upgrade it you will lose some apps that are not compatible with 8.1. When you stay at 8 you lose some apps that work better on 8.1. Acer who has been one my favorites has been a pain in the rear with this trying to get them to not only answer questions, but to accept the questions. Their new web site stinks.
customer_reviews.author: LFlem10500

customer_reviews.title: First one was a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the picture fool you, I didn't read the specs very well I must admit but the keyboard and the mouse are NOT wireless. I like the all-in-one design. However my first experience is NOT good. Took it out the box, my husband set it up and the screen got stuck after set up and then we did an emergency shut off after several minutes of the screen being stuck and the screen never booted up again. He unplugged and tried to restart -- nothing. So we sent it back the next day. We hope the replacement isn't a dud too.
customer_reviews.author: DexterousDiva

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new computer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! This thing is SUPER fast with my great internet service (not sure if it's okay to name my providers company), and it doesn't take up NEAR as much space as my old dinosaur of a computer did (it was 10 yrs old....way past time for a new one!)
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: so far, it's good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister as a gift and i tested it first before sending it abroad. Windows 8 is Kind of confusing the because I'm macintosh user. But so far I like it, it has a dvd rom which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jovel

customer_reviews.title: good product not liking windows 8 though
customer_reviews.text: product is as described, ran right out of the box, looks great on my desk and it is easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kimlyn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer, fast, reliable, and does everything you need with a desktop....
customer_reviews.author: Ric Pantale

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire AZC-605-UR21 19.5-Inch All-in-One Desktop (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Acer Aspire AZC-605-UR21 All-in-One Desktop PC comes with these specs: Intel Pentium Dual-Core Processor 2127U, Windows 8, Intel HM70 Express Chipset, 19.5" HD+ Widescreen LED Back-lit Display, 4096MB DDR3 Memory, Intel HD Graphics, 1TB 7200 RPM SATA3 Hard Drive, 8X DVD SuperMulti Double-Layer Drive, Digital Media Card Reader - Secure Digital Card, Up to 20 Degree Adjustable Built-in HD Webcam and microphone, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11a/b/g/n Wireless, Bluetooth 4.0, Optimized Dolby Home Theater v4 audio enhancement, 2 - USB 3.0 Ports, 2 - USB 2.0 Ports, USB Keyboard and Mouse, 17.64 lbs. 8 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support, Registration/ Limited Warranty Card, McAfee Internet Security Suite (60-day trial)

AMAZON.COM

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars17 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
